dxf2svg
Class Dxf2SvgLogger

java.lang.Object
  dxf2svg.Dxf2SvgLogger
public class Dxf2SvgLogger
extends java.lang.Object

This class can be invoked to output errors or any information you wish. It is meant as a way to capture errors into a file and not have to do all the maintenance of file accounting.

Version:
1.0 - June 18, 2004
Author:
Andrew Nisbet
